DOC.criteria: Over 18 year old Scheduled ( within two week screen visit ) undergo elective orthopedic surgery ( e.g. , bunionectomy , arthroscopic knee surgery , rotator cuff repair ) Moderate severe pain within 8 hour follow completion require surgery Previous anaphylactic serious allergic reaction shellfish opioids History sleep apnea Other Inclusion/Exclusion Criteria May Apply
